nodes.text: Republic Ace is an online flash player game found at The Clone Wars page on the Cartoon Network website and on StarWars.com.
Take command of Anakin Skywalker's Jedi Starfighter, and blast the seemingly endless attacking Separatist forces.

Help Anakin lead the clone Army of the Republic against General Grievous and the Droid Army of the Separatists. Fly to various star systems, grab blaster upgrades, shield recharges and extra lives to continue blasting the flying enemy forces!
The game has three episodes - Geonosis, Kamino, and Lola Sayu. Each episode consists of three levels.
